text: William Clay Ford, Sr. (March 14, 1925 â€“ March 9, 2014) was an American businessman. He was the last surviving grandchild of Henry Ford. Ford owned and served as chairman of the Detroit Lions football team. Ford was born on March 14, 1925 in Detroit, Michigan. He studied at Yale University. Ford died on March 9, 2014 in Grosse Pointe, Michigan from pneumonia, aged 88. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Michigan Category:Businesspeople from Detroit Category:People from Grosse Pointe, Michigan
